TopicTitle: fn F1 for screenshot then what to view on a Mac?

Articles.Content:
I have tried a Scroogle search and a KSP Forum search but still can not find out where the screenshots go or how to view them. I would like to assist SQUAD with proper bug assists and also show off my awesome achievements.

How does one take screenshot playing KSP on a mac, view it and post it?

Preemptive thanks.

The key to take screenshots should be listed in the options menu that you can get to when first starting the game.

A screenshot that you take should be in the screenshots folder with all the other folders, in the one that you downloaded. To upload a screenshot you would have to upload it to an image hosting site such as imgur. Then click on it and copy the forth option from the top left and paste it into a post.

In the Main KSP folder is a screenshot folder.

Edit: sorry phone distracted me and didnt saw your other questions.

I disabled the defaultt functions of my F-Keys while playing on my macbook. That means taking screenshot, quick saving/loading is just normal F-Key, for the usual functions I press Fn-FKey (if you wanna reduce brightness, sound etc...)

Somehow I like it more

And for uploading, like PursuedTank said, imgur.

In the Forum you need [img ]www.KSP.awesomepicture.png[ /IMG] to show it. To do this, just click on the little framed picture.
